00021 NowPlayingInfo::NowPlayingInfo(const std::wstring& artist, const std::wstring& track)
00022 : m_TrackLengthInSecs(-1)
00023 , m_TrackNr(-1)
00024 {
00025     StringOperations::wideCharToUtf8(artist, m_Artist);
00026     StringOperations::wideCharToUtf8(track, m_Track);
00027 }

00029 string NowPlayingInfo::getPostData() const
00030 {
00031     stringstream ss;
00032     ss  << "&a=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_Artist)
00033         << "&t=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_Track)
00034         << "&b=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_Album)
00035         << "&l=" << (m_TrackLengthInSecs > 0 ? StringOperations::getPostData(m_TrackLengthInSecs) : "")
00036         << "&n=" << (m_TrackNr > 0 ? StringOperations::getPostData(m_TrackNr) : "")
00037         << "&m=" << StringOperations::urlEncode(m_MusicBrainzId);
00038 
00039     return ss.str();
00040 }
